content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Would you like to thank a colleague in an unusual way? Congratulate them on the completion of their project? Or simply cheer them up? If so, then you are welcome to visit\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://heroes.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Heroes Portal\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://heroes.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Heroes\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" calls on each of you to be a hero, cooperate and help colleagues, notice their work, and be a “Megamind”, “Helping Hand” and “Great Friend”.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/15f8163d-94dc-4634-b3ae-5acaf099df16/HEROES_NEW.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":847,\"height\":451}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://heroes.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Heroes\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" won't let your work go unnoticed: you already have a badge from the company!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b4dd17b2-fdc8-4087-af49-6ac9a68ec77d/heroes%20welcome.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":339,\"height\":450}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cooperate and help your colleagues, be “Ready! Always Ready!” and a “Creative Mind”, collect badges, notice your colleagues; work, be a “Socializer” and a part of the EPAM Community! \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
